English German word correspondence, expressing common [sound change](sound change.html)s  
especially yâ‡”dg you:du way:weg honey:honigh

Uncommon sound changes  
bri[dg](dg.html)e â‡” BrÃ¼cke  

Unexpected closest neighbors, true false friends (trivial left out or below)  

Gramatically obscure/inexact matchings are _preferred_ here:  
fault	Fehler   =>  
fault	fehlt  

We maximize the (unscientifically) weighted sum of semantic similarity and lexical (char-per-char) similarity :  
If the closest known match strays too far from the english spelling/meaning, we put it into the second list [#unresolved](#unresolved.html), e.g.:  
pay	Pacht?  

There are words which are related but unprettyly corrupted:  
short	kurz  

Then there are words which are very different but related around a corner:  
window	Wind-Auge  

Prefixes don't affect the metric too negatively:  
mean|gemein   (good match)  
born|geboren
